name: Canva: Create and Sell templates
description: Canva is the most powerful content creation tool ever!I created a short but to-the-point course to teach you about:Canva Template ResearchCanva Template CreationCanva Template Selling on GumroadI struggle when I first started selling on Canva because no one was that much free to teach me how to create and then sell Canva templates.This course has everything you need to know to research, create and sell templates on Gumroad.How does it work?Pay what you want (or enter $0 to download for free!)Go

enhancedContent.overview: A comprehensive beginner's course that teaches aspiring digital entrepreneurs how to research, design, and monetize Canva templates through online marketplaces. Perfect for creators looking to build a passive income stream by leveraging Canva's design tools and selling their creations on platforms like Gumroad.
problemsSolved: Lack of guidance on profitable template niches and market research
Difficulty creating professional-quality templates that sell consistently
Confusion about pricing, marketing, and selling digital products online
solutionsBenefits: Learn proven research methods to identify high-demand template categories
Master design techniques that create templates customers actually purchase
Get step-by-step guidance for setting up profitable Gumroad sales funnels
idealFor: Aspiring digital product creators seeking passive income streams
Graphic designers wanting to monetize their Canva skills
Side hustlers looking for scalable online business opportunities
notRecommendedFor: Advanced designers already selling templates successfully
Users seeking complex business automation systems
whatsIncluded: Complete Notion-based course guide with research methodologies
Step-by-step template creation tutorials and best practices
Gumroad selling strategies with pricing and marketing frameworks

faqs.question: Can I customize this template?
faqs.answer: Yes, the Notion course can be duplicated to your workspace and customized with your own notes and modifications.

faqs.question: Do I need Notion AI to use this?
faqs.answer: No, this course works with standard Notion functionality and doesn't require AI features.

faqs.question: How complex is the setup?
faqs.answer: Very simple - just bookmark or duplicate the Notion page to get started immediately with the course content.

faqs.question: Is this updated for 2026?
faqs.answer: The course covers fundamental principles that remain relevant, though specific platform features may evolve.

faqs.question: What if I need help?
faqs.answer: The creator provides support through Twitter, Instagram, LinkedIn, and email for any questions or guidance needed.
